column2: "Na EWURADZE see Moses dɛ
column3: Sen abopon ebien a ɔtse dɛ kan no dze no: na menkyerɛw kan no apon no a ebobɔɔ no no do nsɛm no
column4: wɔ do."

column2: "Na siesie woho sie anapa
column3: na fow bra bepɔw Sinai do anapa no
column4: na yi woho wɔ hɔ kyerɛ me wɔ bepɔw no etsifi."

column2: "Na mma nyimpa biara nnka wo ho mmfow mmba
column3: nkyii so mma wonnhu nyimpa biara wɔ bepɔw no do beebiara; na mma nguan anaa anantwi so nndzidzi wɔ bepɔw no ho."

column2: "Na ɔseen abopon ebien a ɔtse dɛ kan no dze no; na Moses soɛɛr ahanamakye
column3: na ɔfowee kɔr bepɔw Sinai do
column4: dɛ mbrɛ EWURADZE hyɛɛ no no na ɔfaa abopon ebien no kitsaa ne nsamu."

column2: "Na EWURADZE nam mununkum mu sianee
column3: na ɔnye no begyinaa hɔ
column4: na ɔpaa EWURADZE ne dzin."

column2: "Na EWURADZE twaa mu wɔ n’enyim
column3: na ɔpaa dɛ
column4: EWURADZE
column6: Nyankopɔn a ayamuhyehye nye adom ahyɛ no ma
column8: na no mbɔbɔrhu nye no nokwar dɔɔ so;"

column2: "osie mbɔbɔrhu ma mpempem
column3: na ɔdze emumuyɛ nye mbrato nye bɔn kyɛ: na ɔmma afɔdzifo nndzi bem; ɔdze egyanom hɔn emumuyɛ hwɛ mba nye mbanananom
column4: kesi mbasantsen ebiasa nye anan do."

column2: "Na Moses yɛɛ ntsɛm
column3: na ɔbɔɔ ne tsir adze wɔ famu
column4: na ɔsɔree."

column2: "Na ɔsee dɛ
column3: Sɛ afei menya w’enyim enyimnyam a
column4: EWURADZE
column6: ma EWURADZE ndzi hɛn mu nkɔ; osiandɛ wɔyɛ ɔman akɔnkyefo; na fa hɛn emumuyɛ nye hɛn bɔn kyɛ hɛn

column2: "Na ɔsee dɛ
column3: Hwɛ
column4: miridzi ahyɛmu: wo man nyinara enyim na mebɛyɛ anwanwadze
column5: dza wɔnnyɛɛ bi da wɔ asaase nyinara do
column6: anaaso ɔman biara mu: na nkorɔfo a ewɔ hɔn mu nyinara ehu EWURADZE edwuma
column7: osiandɛ adze a medze wo rebɛyɛ no yɛ hu."

column2: "Dwen dza merehyɛ wo ndɛ yi do: hwɛ
column3: murutu Amorinyi
column4: Keenannyi

column2: "Hwɛ woho yie
column3: amma ennye asaase a erokɔ do no do atsefo no eenndzi ahyɛmu:"

column2: "mbom hom mbubu hɔn afɔrmbukyia
column3: wondwuruw hɔn edum
column4: na wontwitwa hɔn Aserim no ngu:"

column2: "na mma nnsɔr onyame fofor bi: osiandɛ EWURADZE
column3: nyia ne dzin nye Onyinkufo No
column4: ɔyɛ Nyame nyinkufo:"

column2: "ɔno bɛyɛ na enye asaase no do atsefo no edzi ahyɛmu
column3: na woekedzi hɔn enyame ekyir abɔ ndwamambra
column4: na wɔabɔ afɔr ama hɔn enyame
column5: na obi afrɛ wo na wo so ekedzi n’afɔrbɔdze no bi;"

column2: "na afa hɔn mbabaa ama wo mbabanyin awar
column3: na hɔn mbabaa no edzi hɔn enyame no ekyir abɔ ndwamambra
column4: na wɔama wo mbabanyin no ekedzi hɔn enyame no ekyir abɔ ndwamambra."

column2: "Mma nnyɛ enyame a woegu mma woho."
"Sie epitsi afahyɛ no. Nda esuon na dzi epitsi
column3: dɛ mbrɛ mehyɛɛ wo no
column4: bosoom Abib mu wɔ mber a wɔahyɛ no mu: osiandɛ bosoom Abib mu na ifii Egypt bae."

column2: "Dza obue yafun mu nyinara medze a; nye wo fiembowa nyinara mu mbakan a wɔyɛ enyin no
column3: ɔnantwi o
column4: oguan o."

column2: "Na asoasopɔnkɔ abakan dze fa eguambaa pon: na sɛ ammpon no a
column3: ɔno bu no kɔn mu. Wo mbabanyin mu mbakan nyinara dze sesa pon hɔn. Na mma obiara mmfa nsapan mmbefir m’enyim."

column2: "Nda esia na yɛ edwuma
column3: na da a otsia esuon no dze
column4: gye w’ahom: funtumber mu nye twaber mu na hom."

column2: "Na dwen adapɛn afahyɛ no do
column3: ewifua twaber mu nduadzewakan no
column4: nye anoboaboa afahyɛ no wɔ afe n’ewiei no."

column2: "Afrenhyia mu mpɛn ebiasa na wo mbabanyin nyinara mbefir wɔ EWURADZE Nyankopɔn
column3: Israel Nyankopɔn no enyim."

column2: "Na mubotutu amanaman wɔ w’enyim
column3: na matsɛw w’ahe mu: nkyii so sɛ erofow akɔ ekefir wɔ EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn enyim afrenhyia mu mpɛn ebiasa a
column4: nyimpa biara n’enyi nnkɛber w’asaase."

column2: "Mma mmfa mbɔrkaw nnka m’afɔr bɔgyaa ho; nkyii so mma adze nnkye apaho afahyɛ afɔr no do."
"W’asaase mu nduadzewakan a odzi kan no fa bra EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn fie. Mma nnoa apɔnkyeba wɔ ne na no numfonsu mu."
"Na EWURADZE see Moses dɛ
column3: Kyerɛw asɛm yi: na nsɛm yi do na megyina menye wo na ɔnye Israel edzi ahyɛmu."

column2: "Na ɔnye EWURADZE dzii hɔ adaduanan adzekyee nye adzesaa; nkyii so oenndzi edziban
column3: ɔannom nsu so. Na ɔkyerɛɛw ahyɛmu nsɛm no
column4: mbransɛm du no wɔ apon no do."

column2: "Na ɔbaa dɛ
column3: aber a Moses fi bepɔw Sinai do sianee no
column4: nna dasepon ebien no dze ne nsamu
column5: na aber a Moses fi bepɔw no do sianee no
column6: nna onnyim dɛ osiandɛ ɔnye EWURADZE kasae ntsi n’enyim wer ahyerɛn."

column2: "Na aber a Aaron nye Israelmba no nyinara hun Moses no
column3: hwɛ
column4: nna n’enyim wer hyerɛn: na wosuroo dɛ wɔbɛbɛn no."

column2: "Na Moses frɛɛ hɔn; na Aaron nye mboanofo no mu mpanyimfo no nyinara sanee baa ne nkyɛn: na Moses kasaa kyerɛɛ hɔn."
"Na n’ekyir no Israelmba no nyinara twee bɛnee: na ɔdze dza EWURADZE kaa kyerɛɛ no wɔ bepɔw Sinai do no nyinara hyɛɛ hɔn mbra."
"Na aber a Moses nye hɔn wiee kasa no
column3: ɔdze nkataenyim kataa n’enyim."

column2: "Na aber a Moses rokɔ EWURADZE enyim nye no akɛkasa no
column3: oyii nkataenyim no
column4: dze kodur dɛ ofii ne nkyɛn; na ofii ne nkyɛn na ɔbɛkaa dza wɔdze hyɛɛ no no kyerɛɛ Israelmba no;"

column2: "na Israelmba no hun Moses n’enyim dɛ Moses n’enyim wer no hyerɛn: na Moses dze nkataenyim kataa n’enyim bio
column3: kodur dɛ ɔkɔr mu nye EWURADZE kɛkasae."
